title: New: Redinho – Stay Together
content:
Numbers just dropped the new single from Redinho.

This man really has heaps loads of talent. His first two EP’s for the label, Bare Blips and Edge Off, were two of the best from the entire label, in my opinion. He can make the most mindfucking noises that sound out of this world. What I also love is the odd track has great Dâm-Funk-esque vocoded vocals – as is apparent in this one. He’s playing Boiler Room once again tonight, as part of the Numbers showcase, alongside Randomer, Mosca, Deadboy and hosts Jackmaster & Spencer (tune in at 8pm).

This single’s out at the beginning of December, and it really does hit the right spots – as with the addictiveness of Rustie‘s recent release, Redinho‘s track sours to greater heights at every break. The electronic voraciousness escalates and disappears into glee. I hate to type that last word but this guy really does make brilliant, and fun, electronic funk. One truly worthy for Christmas number one.

Listen to Stay Together below. The single is out December 5th via Numbers, and will be part of his debut album, out ‘sometime 2012’.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d10
